As president, I will shut down the Keystone and Dakota Access pipelines. They should never have been built in the first place.
The ability to hear should not be a luxury for those who can afford it. That is why hearing aids are covered under Medicare for All.

Use common sense! 

If I was defending @FBI lying to #FISA court AFTER report from IG came out wouldn’t every major news outlet report it?

And why would a “story” try to make an interview from July 2018 look like it was a recent statement? 

#FakeNews doesn’t happen by accident. http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EMz4R3wXsAM4eCx.jpg

We must do better for our children and #workingfamilies

Corporations are not people.

We must overturn Citizens United and get big money out of our political process.

This election isn’t about whether or not we start a fight. 

We’re already in a fight. 

This is about how we win.
Despair is not an option. http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EM0qcoJXsAAwtnM.jpg https://video.twimg.com/amplify_video/1210665147196432395/vid/320x320/Dwro_Y0cVSpSABOf.mp4?tag=13

Over 40 years, the richest 0.1% have seen their wages quadruple, leaving everyone—even the top 1%—behind.

✅Rapidly expand unions
✅Make the ultra-rich pay their taxes

.@SaraCarterDC when are you going to change your tweet & #FakeNews on your website so people know that my statement wasn’t recent, it was in July 2018, 16 months before ANYONE knew that an @FBI lawyer & investigators lied in their #FISA applications? http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EM0AFiFX0AAfGv5.jpg

If this story would have been written originally the way it is now it wouldn’t have even been noticed.

If we can't take care of our veterans when they come home, then we shouldn't be sending them off to war in the first place. I will fight against privatizing the VA and work to ensure world-class health care for every American who served our country in the armed forces.
It's going to take more than winning an election to address the climate crisis. That is why we are building a movement that is prepared to take on the fossil fuel industry and pass a Green New Deal.

Families should be able to get an education without being drowned in debt. They should be able to go to work without child care costs eating up their paychecks. They should be able to get the health care they need without risking bankruptcy.

We need big, structural change.
Amazon should pay more than $0 in federal income taxes.
It has now been one year since Paul Whelan, a U.S. citizen, was unjustly detained in #Russia. He should be released immediately and reunited with his family.
